info.name: Modern UI
info.additionalInfo:
2019.07.29:
Styled the following items:
- "Spinner" overlay when LP processes a request.
- "Help" button in the bottom-right.
- ".container.folder" which precedes a gant estimate on the timeline bars.
- Fullscreen task view
- Modal Dialog windows now have better styling and whitespace

2019.07.26:
- This version adds replacement icons provided by FontAwesome.   Honestly, this is some of the weirdest CSS magic I've pulled to date. Affected are: Hold, Comments, completed, Packages, Workspace, Expand/Collapse buttons, notice, and checkboxes!
- Completed rows are now grayed out
- On-hold rows are now lit
- Highlights now extend all the way to the edge (they used to stop at the comments & status icon columns)
- Checkboxes in tasks are a lot easier to click.
- Styled the Schedule "Ready" and "Updating" button (top-right)

---------

Made the full area of the links at the top clickable (you used to have to be precise on the text, rather than the background like everything else).
Tinted the Logo to match the rest of the slightly blue theme.
Squared up the sidebar navigation on the project view.
Added highlight colors for "Add New" and "Trash" (second has a pulsating red effect).
Cleaned up the borders and shadowing of dialogs
Cleaned up the spacing of all header buttons.
Header buttons now fit within the 50px metric of the design.
Made the styling of Task Info panel buttons consistent with the rest of the dark theme.
Made the search input field fullsize like the rest of the UI.
Made the description text, and comments more legible.
Added back the comment seperator (since it was matching the background before).
Cleaned up Timesheet formatting
Cleaned up navigation bar buttons at the top of the projects view (made them consistent in appearance, and clear that they don't relate to the column cells below them).
Updated the appearance of the "cancel" button at the top of the filters.
